AllMovingUnits.Description: Transports with Passengers.SyncOwner set to true will have the owner of their passengers changed to match the transport if transport’s owner changes.
if set to true (which is the default), changes the passengers’ owner back to whatever it was originally when they entered the transport when they are ejected.

InfantryUnits.Description: Infantry can now have its DefaultDisguise overridden per-type
Infantry with NotHuman=yes can now play random death anim sequence between Die1 to Die5 instead of the hardcoded Die1

suicide: Kill each slave if the slave miner is killed; master: Free the slaves but keep the house of the slave unchanged; neutral: The slaves belong to civilian house; killer: Free the slaves and give them to the house of the slave miner’s killer. (vanilla behavior)
SlavesFreeSound is now dehardcoded from AudioVisual and can be set individually for each enslavable infantry type

Weapons.Description: have same weapon detonate multiple Warheads on impact by listing
